divs: Sighting Detailsat 9:15 am saturday sunny day no clouds walked outside our company garage, looked up and saw an orange color sphere high above in the sky on a noth east direction,asked our dispather if she could come out and see this thing she was able to see it too with the naked eye ,she had a small pair of binoculars in her car but could not see i did and whith them the shape was disc all gold and at the bottom like mustard red color took some pictures with a canon powershot a560 4xoptical zoom i cannott see it on the camera maybe when i download them into my computer i might see something it was kind of low at the begining and suddenly it disapear and was now seen to the west at a high altitude it kind of disappear and appeared just stood still for another 20 minutes and then it was gone total time aproximately 40 minutes at fist didnt notice any airplains comming in for landind at lax after that thing got higher in altitude noticed that planes started to show,cant say how high it was but it was high ...
Summary: gold color sphere/ w/naked eye -disc shape w/binoculars
trends: There has been one other sighting in Santa Fe Springs
There were no other sightings in Santa Fe Springs on or around February 9th 2008
